title: China vs. Taiwan, Explained From Both Sides

media:group.media:title: China vs. Taiwan, Explained From Both Sides
media:group.media:description:
An explanation of the Taiwanese view of the Taiwan conflict, followed by an explanation of China's view of the conflict.

If you want to support the channel, here are the best ways to do it:

1) Watch the full video
2) Subscribe if you haven't
3) Share with a friend
4) Support me with a small donation on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/rchapman 

0:00 Intro
0:40 How Taiwan Views China
12:34 How China Views Taiwan
22:23 Outro

Sources:

A History Of Taiwan - Hung Chien-Chao
Forbidden Nation - Jonathan Manthorpe
The First Chinese Democracy - Linda Chao & Ramon Myers
Generalissimo - Jay Taylor
The Rise Of China In Chinese Eyes - Xuetong Yan
The World According To China - Elizabeth Economy
The Search For Modern China - Jonathan Spence
On China - Henry Kissinger
